articles.title: Laurence Fox: ‘People need immunity from the virus of wokery’ - The Telegraph
articles.description: The actor predicts that the culture wars will stoke more division than Brexit – and explains how his Reclaim party is planning to fight
articles.content: The film offer comes just as Foxs political career is taking off in Westminster. After a donation of £5 million from former Conservative donor Jeremy Hosking got the ball rolling last summer, the Ele… [+3747 chars]
